resources.string: Pause and Resume song to see effects

Verse basically automates the process of Googling the lyrics and shows this in a clean UI.

It uses the media feed from spotify to know what song is currently going on.

I know ads are irritating but lately I've been considering on showing few passive ads in the app. You can let me know how you feel about it through the feedback option. I'll make a decision based on your input.

Thanks for using Verse and If you have left a rating and a review on the PlayStore, I can't thank you enough. You made my day!

Using the spotify's Broadcast Verse calculates the time a song would play for and if there is no new next song while the song is not paused, It mutes the device until there's a new song.

I would like to give shout out to oyvindsam's SpotMute app for all the core logic behind this function.
 If you don't need the lyrics functionality and only the Ad Mute with more customisations, Try SpotMute from playstore
